name: v1_riddles
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool riddles_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Quality riddles perfect for entertainment apps. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/riddles
API description: API Ninjas Riddles API endpoint. Returns one or more random riddles.

limit.description: The number of riddles to return. Must be between 1 and 20. Defaults to None.
